title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Aug. 25
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Aug. 25
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl Riccadonna Chief US Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "The ties that bind U.S. stock, bond volatility strenghten." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
